content:
(test) Ah! What's this mah~!
Are they... are they just watering the fields non-stop mah~?
N-no no no no, this won't do at all mah~!
info: 云果告知制止路人浇水_云果线1

content:
Q-quick quick quick, {me}, stop them!
Too much water will drown the seedlings mah~,
J-just, just, just use the insect net, bonk them with the insect net!
info: 云果告知制止路人浇水_云果线1
